member.name: T:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection
member.summary: Wraps the StreamReader, StreamWriter, and TcpClient together to provide a unified interface for network actions.

member.name: F:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection._tcpClient
member.summary: Represents the underlying TCP client used for the connection.

member.name: F:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection._reader
member.summary: The reader for incoming messages.

member.name: F:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection._writer
member.summary: The writer for outgoing messages.

member.name: M:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection.#ctor(System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an existing TCP client.

member.name: M:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates a new, unconnected TcpClient.

member.name: P:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the connection is currently active.

member.name: M:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to a remote host and port.
member.param: The remote host's URL or IP address.
The port number to connect to.

member.name: M:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection.Send(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a message to the remote endpoint. Appends a newline character to treat it as a complete message.

member.name: M:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection.ReadLine
member.summary: Reads a message from the remote endpoint up to the first newline.
member.returns: The message received from the remote endpoint.
member.exception: Thrown if the connection is closed by the remote host.

member.name: M:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects the connection and disposes of the resources.

member.name: M:CS3500.Networking.NetworkConnection.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the NetworkConnection.

member.summary: Determine the hashcode for this vector

member.summary: Rotate this vector clockwise by degrees Requires that this vector be normalized

member.summary: Return the angle as measured in degrees clockwise from up Requires that this vector be normalized

member.summary: Return the angle as measured in degrees clockwise from up Requires that this vector be normalized

member.summary: Subtract two vectors with the - operator

member.name: M:GameLab.Models.Vector2D.op_Multiply(GameLab.Models.Vector2D,System.Double)
member.summary: Multiply a vector by a scalar This has the effect of growing (if s greater than 1) or shrinking (if s less than 1), without changing the direction.
member.param: The vector (left-hand side of the operator)
The scalar (right-hand side of the operator)

member.summary: Compute the length of this vector
